title: Yes, I am disturbingly excited
author: VD
content_html:
About this:

Smart phone maker Palm said on Tuesday it would use a new platform based on Linux to help the company compete better.

The ability to hotsync easily, combined with my own application’s move to a platform model, is all I will really require to move back to Linux for day-to-day operations.

About
this
:
Smart phone maker Palm said on Tuesday it would use a new platform based on Linux to help the company compete better.
The ability to hotsync easily, combined with my own application’s move to a platform model, is all I will really require to move back to Linux for day-to-day operations.
